text: Eteke yetiya kataki ahi chula'imanara ocarata pale, tetiya te'om uttarata ka’le, ‘tomaloke moka dhana-sampada pradana karai sahaya karaiba bicaraicha neki? (Suna) allahe moka yi dana karaiche seya tomalokaka yi diche tatakaiyo utkrsta baram tomaloke'i tomalokara upadhaukana lai ananda karaagai
